::FireBlade's Spark::
The spark felt cold seperate from the body it had laid in for so vrey
long.  SO long FireBLade it said to itself.....

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
>
> * Iron Raptor panted, pain seering through her body as her spine lay
exposed
> to attack from the blast.
> If she had been any weaker she would have fallen but she stayed,
looking
> down at the clearing image of the still FireBlade.
> She had nearly cut his head clean off of his form, but she had delt
enough
> damage, recieved enough of her own as well.
> Her she stilled and slowed her breathing to listen to what was being
> braudcasted over the comm-link, looking off over the battle field.
> TigerHawk...taking command?
> < I can't let him, he'll...kill them!>*
>
> " Maximals..."  * she breathed heavily, though the comm was now open
for her
> voice to be heard.
> But with a jolt of pain she converted back into robot mode, then
ultrametal
> mode, standing in a slumped position and looking out at the fighting
> Maximals.*
>
> " Help me. Help...me fight them."
>
> * She took a step out towards the remaining battle, barely able to
complete
> it.*
>
> " We...CAN'T LET THEM WIN!"
>
> * IR struggled to stay on her feet.*
>
> " But being wounded...can help none.  Though hurt, repair
yourselves. All of
> you able to fight...help me show these slags we WON'T lay down and DIE!"
>
> * And with the deactivation of the comm-link, and will she drew her
sword.
> Drawing into an attack stance. Cape billowing out behind her.*
>
>
>
>
